property.label: Title
property.title: DublinCore title. May be any free text.

property.label: Label
property.title: RDF Schema label, i.e. a human-readable name that applications can use for displaying in user interfaces. May be any free text.

property.label: Name
property.title: FOAF name, i.e. a name for some thing as defined in FOAF vocabulary. May be any free text.

property.label: Description
property.title: DublinCore description, i.e. a human-readable description of the resource. May be any free text.

property.label: Keyword (for ODP)
property.title: A word or phrase used to succinctly describe an asset in Open Data Portal. May be any free text.

property.label: Keyword (DCAT)
property.title: A keyword or tag describing the dataset. May be any free text.

property.label: Publisher
property.title: DublinCore publisher, i.e. a person, an organization, or a service that is the resource's publisher. May be any free text, but it is advised to use URLs.

property.label: License
property.title: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource. Usually a URL pointing to the document.

property.label: Page
property.title: FOAF page, i.e. a URL pointing to the web page or document about the resource.

property.label: Landing page
property.title: A Web page that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the dataset, its distributions and/or additional information.
